name: Genius Archers Streaming
author: Mung Mung Kim
content: Yoo Sanghyun, once the youngest champion in a national archery competition and a highly promising talent, saw his dreams shattered by a tragic accident that rendered him unable to handle a bow ever again.Now, as a fallen prodigy, he faced the additional setback of being fired from the company he had joined.
